text.div:
XDSRelationshipType

The kind of relationship between two XDS documents.

This value set has an inline code system http://hl7.org/fhir/xds-relationship-type, which defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
APND APNDA separate XDS document that references a prior document, and may extend or alter the observations in the prior document.
RPLC RPLCA new version of an existing document.
XFRM XFRMA transformed document is derived by a machine translation from some other format.
XFRM_RPLC XFRM_RPLCBoth a XFRM and a RPLC relationship.
signs SignsThis document signs the target document.

name: XDSRelationshipType
description: The kind of relationship between two XDS documents.

concept.definition: A separate XDS document that references a prior document, and may extend or alter the observations in the prior document.
A new version of an existing document.
A transformed document is derived by a machine translation from some other format.
Both a XFRM and a RPLC relationship.
This document signs the target document.
